episodes.title: The Tariq Nasheed Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: We have the good brother @TariqNasheed in the studio discussing politics, white supremacy and the art of mackin. Also make sure you go and support 1804:The Hidden History of Haiti https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/1804-the-hidden-history-of-haiti#/

episodes.title: The Year Of The Draco
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: We kick off 2017 with some real jewels from a jeweler because if you fail to plan, you plan to fail beloved. We share our thoughts on our year and give a prediction for what 2017 has in store for us. We are also joined by the educated sister @DJMissMilan and the beautiful and recently single @Barolinne so as always press play and enjoy.

episodes.title: The Year End Episode feat Wayno, Rel Carter and BK Tidal Wave
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
As 2016 comes to a close we bring together Wayno, Rel Carter and BK Tidal Wave to discuss what exactly happened this year and what we all have to look forward to in 2017.

You can get your first month's subscription of Bevel for free by going to www.getbevel.com/taxseason

Use promo code TAX15 to get 15% off and free shipping on your next order of www.EwingAthletics.com

episodes.title: The Bhristmas Episode Live From DC
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Merry Bhristmas you filthy animals. We want to thank all the listeners for your support this year so as a gift we present to you the D.C. Live Show featuring Tony Lewis (@mrtonylewisjr) and Sofi Green (@IMSOFIGREEN). And as always pour some Dusse, light an Optimo and press play.

episodes.title: The Gillie Da Kid Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
It's only right we bring the Philly legend Gillie Da Kid up to New York to discuss who really is the king of Philly, how some Chicago rappers need guidance and why sometimes your OG is just and old G. We also have the educated sister DJ Miss Milan joining us in the studio. So pour some Dusse, light an Optimo and press play.

You can get your first month's subscription of Bevel for free by going to www.getbevel.com/taxseason

Use promo code TAX15 to get 15% off and free shipping on your next order of www.EwingAthletics.com

episodes.title: The LOX Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
In today's episode we are living off experience and also copious amounts of Dusse. Never let anyone tell you we don't do this for the culture.

You can get your first month's subscription of Bevel for free by going to www.getbevel.com/taxseason

episodes.title: The Black Thought Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
We have the living legend Black Thought on the studio today. What's more to say than press play beloved.

episodes.title: The Nick Cannon Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
We have the young legend Nick Cannon in the studio today dropping real gems. What more can I say but press play and enjoy.

To get your first month of your Bevel subscription for free go to www.GetBevel.com/taxseason

Get 15% off your next www.EwingAthletics.com order by using promo code TAX15

episodes.title: The G Herbo Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
In today's episode we have the young spitter G Herbo in the studio discussing Chicago, drill music and why you should never trust men who join gangs in their 40s. Press play and enjoy responsibly but most importantly respect your liver it's Dusse season.

Go to GetBevel.com/TaxSeason to order your Bevel today and get the first month for free.

Make sure you go to www.EwingAthletics.com and use promo code TAX15 to get 15% off your next order with free shipping.

episodes.title: The Chad Ocho Cinco Johnson Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: I say that to say this we got Chad Ocho Cinco (@ochocinco) on the show today. We talk NFL, concussions and what type of women have the best snacks in the crib. Also joining Tax and Chad is the educated sister Miko Grimes (@iHeartMiko)calling in from LA. So be respectful and roll something in an Optimo, pour some Dusse and press play.

episodes.title: The Donald Trump Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: A wise man once said there's a war going on outside no man is safe from. I had to get Reggie Osse (@Combat_Jack) and Kenneth Montgomery (@EsqMontgomery) in the studio to discuss the election. Press play and BESAFETHO.

episodes.title: The Meek Mill Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Riding in the Wraith, stars in the roof. You asked for it so we delivered. Pour some Dusse, roll your finest in an Optimo and press play.

episodes.title: The Casanova, DJ Miss Milan And Manolo Rose Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Sometimes the culture demands a certain type of episode in order to put things in perspective and guarantee that the future is in good hands. However, I say that to say this we have Casanova, DJ Miss Milan and Manolo Rose Episode in the building. Conduct yourself in a respectful manner and press play.

episodes.title: The Naturi Naughton Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Today we drop a special double episode. We start with the beautiful Nubian Queen Naturi Naughton who drops by to discuss growing up in East Orange, acting and what's next for Power. Joining Naturi and Tax, we have the educated sister Sofi Green (@imsofigreen) filling in a guest co-host.

In part 2 we have a special discussion about rape culture with sexpert, Michelle Hope (@MHSexpert)we had to record to this episode in light of what's going on in the news. So as we always say sit back and press play.

Use promo code "TAX15" at www.EwingAthletics.com to get 15% off your next order with free shipping.

episodes.title: The Rico Love Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
We have the young legend Rico Love live from Miami. The audio starts off a bit rough but eventually gets better. Be respectful, I have a family.  Also make sure you subscribe on iTunes and follow us on SoundCloud.

Get your first month of your Bevel subscription for free by going to GetBevel.com/TaxSeason

To win a copy of Mafia 3 go to Mafiagame.com/TaxSeason

episodes.title: The Jeezy Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
In this episode we have Atlanta's own Jeezy in the building dropping gems about his life and career. This is the episode everyone has been asking for and we finally did it. Also in the studio we have the educated and beautiful sister Sofi Green (@IAMSOFIGREEN)filling in as special guest host. This is the episode you sit back and light one too.

For a chance to win a copy of Mafia III go to MafiaGame.com/TaxSeason

Use promo code TAX15 to get 15% off and free shipping of your next order at www.EwingAthletics.com

episodes.title: The Return of Beanie Sigel feat DJ Self
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
We originally planned on just having DJ Self in the studio but earlier in the day Beans called and said he had something to get off his chest. The Broad Street Bully (24:30 Start of Beanie Sigel Interview)was never known to hold back his tongue and in this episode he made sure to let the mac ring. Be safe tho. 


Use Promo code "TAX" to get 20% off your first month at GetBevel.com

Use Promo Code "TAX15" to get 15% off and free shipping on your next order at EwingAthletics.com

episodes.title: The Race Episode feat. Kenneth J. Montgomery
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In this episode we have attorney and professor Kenneth J. Montgomery (@EsqMontgomery) give us a lecture on race, history, police brutality and white supremacy. This is a very insightful episode. Please press play and pass this on to your friends and family.  #BESAFETHO

episodes.title: The @MysticxLipstick Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In this episode we have the educated sister Danielle Ayoka aka @MysticxLipstick discussing astrology, metaphysics and we even get her to do a reading on the bad guy. So sit back, be safe tho and press play.

episodes.title: The Oschino Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Philly spitter and former State Property member Oschino stops by to discuss coming home, the Philly rap scene and his issues with Beanie Sigel. 

BESAFETHO

episodes.title: The Dusse & Wings Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
We ordered Dusse and wings and recorded an episode. For culturural purposes of course. Also in the studio is the Jamaican empress @Alexa_Leighton Press play and enjoy

Go to EwingAthletics.com and use promo code TAX15 to get 15% off and free shipping on your next order.

episodes.title: The Star Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: We have the legend Star in the studio dropping jewel after jewel. This man is a legend and this interview has been long over due. Press play and thank us later.

episodes.title: The Beanie Sigel Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Every time I step in the booth, I speak the truth. Today we bring you the Broad Street Bully himself, Beanie Sigel. In the co-host seat we have the educated sister @KyraChaos. Sit back, pour yourself a cup, put something in the air and press play.

episodes.title: The No Jumper Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In this episode we have Adam22 (@OnSomeShit) from the @NoJumper podcast discussing growing up in New Hampshire, being a professional BMX rider and why he is an advocate for anallingus. We also have the beautiful @Kell_Rischelle as our special guest co-host.  We recorded this episode last month at his shop (127 E 5th St, Los Angeles, CA 90013) and smoked a lot of weed while doing it so press play and enjoy.

episodes.title: The Sex Therapy Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In this episode we have sexologist Michelle Hope (@MHSexpert) discussing sex, squirting, STDs and why being baptized may or may not be a great form of safe sex. Also in the studio we have the beautiful sister @DJNolita filling in as guest host. So sit back with your significant other and press play.

episodes.title: The Friend Zone Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
In this episode we have the cast of The Friend Zone @LookAtDustin @HeyFranHey and @HeyAssante stopping by to discuss life, love and why we must always strive to overcome negative energy. 

For tickets for The Friend Zone live show on 8/13 head over to www.thefriendzonelive.com

episodes.title: The Black Jesus Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Actor and comedian Slink Johnson who plays Black Jesus stops by to share his story on how he started acting, what character he should play in a Tyler Perry movie and even spits a few bars. Also in the studio we have the beautiful educated sister @KyraChaos filling in as guest co-host. So sit back, pour some fine cognac in a glass and press play.

episodes.title: The Black Lives Matter Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: We are living in some troubling times and I had to speak on what's been going on across the country. We originally had another episode planned for today but I had to get this off my chest. In the studio we welcome @ItsTracyG, @BlogXilla and @Mouse_Jones this is a very special episode so please sit back and listen twice.

episodes.title: The T. Rodgers Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Humanitarian, actor and founder of the Black P Stones, T. Rodgers talks with Taxstone about race, the culture and his deep history in the game. Also in the building we have TK and Kenny B. This is a very special episode so please sit back and press play.

episodes.title: The Too Short Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
The west coast legend Too Short stops by to discuss coming up in Oakland, the pimp game, being one of the first platnium rappers and why Dr. Dre is such a perfectionist. Also in the building is the beautiful educated sister @kellrishelle filling in as guest co-host and Short Dog's newest artist @OfficialAnaLou check out her latest single with Too Short here https://soundcloud.com/officialanalou/ana-lou-bet-on-me-ft-too-short

For all your merch check out www.ShopTaxstone.com

episodes.title: The Wesley Pipes Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
As we continue our West Coast run we bring you the legend Wesley Pipes. Also in the studio we have the ravishing @Kell_Rischelle sitting in as the special guest co-host. So many gems dropped in this episode you will need to listen twice. So sit back, roll something and press play. 

Make sure you head over to www.ShopTaxstone.com to get all your merch.

episodes.title: The Ben Baller Episode feat Miko Grimes
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: As we continue our West Coast run we bring to you the Ben Baller episode. You may know Ben for being a celebrity jeweler but his history runs deep. From running with Dr. Dre and Pac, to being a label executive and shitting on Lebron we have the real story here. Also in the studio is guest co-host Miko Grimes. Make sure you check out her new podcast at https://soundcloud.com/iheartmiko

episodes.title: The West Coast Episode starring Xzibit, YG & Problem
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: You said we weren't showing the West no love so we went and got Xzibit, YG and Problem all on the same episode. Sit back and push play beloved.

episodes.title: The Junior Galette Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Junior Galette from the Washington Redskins stops by to discuss playing ball professionally, getting money and what really happened on that Miami beach. Also in the building is the beautiful educated sister Sofi Green and Brooklyn's own Abillyon.

episodes.title: The Mistah Fab Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
We got the Bay area legend Mistah F.A.B in the building discussing battle rap, the Bay area sound and knocking people out. Also Serius Jones and DJ Miss Milan stop by to join the discussion. You've been saying we haven't been showing the West any love so here it is beloved. Sit back, light something and press play. 

Go to TaxSeasonLive.com to get your tickets for the September 10, 2016 London show.

episodes.title: The Fame School X STASHED Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
This week the STASHED crew join us in the studio to discuss their new project the STASHED Print Volume 1. It's a fly book so make sure you're respectful and cop several copies https://print.thestashed.com/product/stashed-print-vol-1-hard-copy/

Also in the studio we have Slim and Telli from Fame School discussing their new single featuring Tax, creating a new sound for the city and Slim's affinity for Nubian queens. Press play and enjoy. 

https://soundcloud.com/fameschool/bag-feat-taxstone

episodes.title: The TK Kirkland Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: We've been trying to put this episode together for a long time but finally we have Tax and comedian TK Kirkland in the studio together. Stop reading this, push play and thank me later. You're welcome INTERNETS.

episodes.title: The Kodak Black Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Tax and Sofi Green go to Atlantic records and interview the Finesse Kid, hilarity ensures. 

Go to EwingAthletics.com and use promo code TAX15 to get 15% and free shipping on your entire order.

episodes.title: The Ericka Pittman Episode feat Baroline Diaz
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: This week we have Ericka Pittman who is the Vice President of Comb’s Enterprises Chairman’s Office. From working with Diddy to empowering women, Ericka drops many jewels. Also in the studio is special guest co-host Baroline Diaz of EMVE management group. You asked for it, so here it is. We have some strong women on the show so sit back and press play.

episodes.title: The Second Therapy Episode feat. Dr. Maya Pettiford
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Dr. Maya Pettiford returns 6 months later to continue Tax's therapy sessions. A lot has happened between that time. Does Tax have a break through? Does he cry? Is Dr. Pettiford sturdy enough? Press play and all will be revealed. An as always be safe tho.

episodes.title: The Fat Joe & Remy Ma Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Fat Joe and Remy Ma pull and discuss the new single, how they reconnected and why you should never trust anyone with dirty Timbs. Also Sofi Green drops by to give advice on love, battle rappers and DC women. Be safe tho internets and press play.

episodes.title: The AR-AB, Sofi Green & DJ Miss Milan Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: The self proclaimed King of Philly, AR-AB stops by to discuss beef in his city, getting shot and what's next for the Philadelphia rapper. Also in the studio, we have the good natural sister Sofi Green and Queen's own DJ Miss Milan. Press play beloved and thank me later.

episodes.title: The Live 1 Year Anniversary Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Recorded at the SVA Theatre in downtown Manhattan on March 26, 2016 we present to you the the Tax Season Live 1 Year Anniversary Episode

episodes.title: The FanBros & Bbillions Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In the studio we are joined by SadderDay impresario @Bbillions and @TatianaKing and @djbenhameen of the FanBros podcast. We opened up two bottles of Dusse and the rest of the night got hazy so press play and enjoy.

episodes.title: The #AskTax X Young Dolph Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: We've been getting a lot of requests to bring back the #AskTax segment so we decided to dedicate a large portion of the episode to answer your questions. Joining us in the studio we have the beautiful  and talented sister Sofi Green (@IMSOFIGREEN) and the Engine Room underboss Aviane (@LovePERFECTION). And because we love you we also liberated the Young Dolph episode we had in the vault. Dolph came through last month and talked about the streets, rap and why he thinks he's the King of Memphis. This is a very dope episode so sit back and press play beloved.

episodes.title: The Big Body Bes Episode Live from the Chicken Spot
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
We are live from the chicken spot in East New York. We shut the place down and had some grown man talk with the legend Big Body Bes. The Dusse was flowing and that uptown piff was in the air. Sit back and press play beloved.

Shout out to NYC Famous Chicken 3367 Fulton St. Brooklyn, NY

episodes.title: A Boy's Life in the Age of Mass Incarceration feat. Tony Lewis Jr
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Community activist and author, Tony Lewis Jr. stops by to discuss mass incarceration, growing up the son of a kingpin and the aftermath of having a parent sentenced to life. 

To purchase A Boy's Life in the Age of Mass Incarceration go to www.slugglife.com

episodes.title: The Plies Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: I say that to say this, it's Plies and Tax on the same episode so just press play.

episodes.title: The Karen Civil Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Karen Civil is everywhere right now. Working with brands like Beats by Dre to the White House and the Clinton campaign, you can never deny her glo up. Not one to hold her tongue she discusses the controversy over old tweets, issues with past relationships and why you should #LiveCivil.

episodes.title: The Crissle & Kid Fury Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Crissle and Kid Fury from the hit podcast, The Read finally make their debut appearance on Tax Season. Nothing is off limits as the trio discusses Black Lives Matter, groupies and new found success. Also make sure you listen to the special announcement we have for Tax Season fans. Sit back, pour some Dusse and press play.

episodes.title: The Mendeecees Harris Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: This episode was recorded a few days before Mendeecees had to turn himself in to serve an 8 year prison bid. With time running out Meneecees discusses the snitching allegations, how his family is dealing with his sentence and how he mentally prepares to enter prison.

episodes.title: The PNB Rock Episode feat Sofi Green
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In this episode we have Philly's own PNB Rock discussing signing to Atlantic, why his DMs are filthy and creating a new sound. We also have Sofi Green in the building talking about her music and why Tax calls her the last natural woman on IG.

episodes.title: The Russell Simmons Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
In this episode the OG Russell Simmons stops by to talk to the young OG about being a vegan, his new book and why meat is killing us.

Stay woke internets and press play.

episodes.title: The Miko Grimes Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Miko Grimes is the definition of a ride or die chick.  As the wife of Miami Dolphin Brent Grimes, she has been very vocal about the NFL and does not hold her tongue. In this episode she discusses her arrest, groupies and what she would change in the NFL.

Start shaving smarter use promo code "TAX" to get 20% off your first purchase at GetBevel.com

Build it beautiful. Use promo code "TAX" to get 10% off your next purchase at Squarespace.

episodes.title: The Uncle Murda Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Happy New Year Internets! We have East New York's own Uncle Murda in the studio to start the year off right. Tax and Uncle Murda discuss the 2015 Rap Up, IG honeys with suspicious body odors and what's next for the Brooklyn rapper.

Need to borrow money? Go to Avantoffer.com and use promo code "taxseason" to get a personal loan of up to $35,000. See website for details.

episodes.title: The Dave East Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In the last of episode 2015, we have Harlem’s own Dave East in the studio discussing converting to Islam, recording with Nas and dealing with internet weirdos. We also have special co-host Dominique (@_FabDLSass) discussing what rapper DMs she has slid into and why Tax owes her $33.

episodes.title: The Rowdy Rebel & Return of HennyPalooza Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
In this episode GS9's own Rowdy Rebel calls us from Rikers to give us an update on his case, music and how he maintains his sanity while being locked up.

Also the gentlemen from HennyPalooza stop by to talk about their 3 year anniversary, why Kaz is a forefather in the anal lingus movement, if Chris Styles is on a groceries eating world tour and why Kam doesn't partake in groupies. 

This is a very special episode for the holidays so gather around the Christmas tree and press play.

Use promo code "TAX" to get 20% off your next purchase at GetBevel.com for the the premier shaving system for people with coarse and curly hair.

episodes.title: ItsTheReal Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
In this episode Tax is joined in the studio by Hip Hop sketch comedians, Eric and Jeff of ItsTheReal. Also making a special appearance is the good sister from BedStuy, Quinza (@NpPsJustQs0. The guys talk about the benefits of dating Panamanian women, comedy groupies and we get down to the reason why Tax is now a breast man. Sit back and press play.

To save 20% off your next Bevel purchase use promo code "TAX" at the checkout.

episodes.title: The Twista Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: The Chicago legend, Twista stops by to talk about being in the game for over 20 years, the violence in Chicago, why he isn't feeling Chiraq and we even get him to spit a verse.

episodes.title: The Andrew Schultz Ep f/ Premium Pete
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Ok, this one is all over the place but funny as fux. Tax is joined by Andrew Schultz aka Yung Hezzy aka Whiter Iverson from the Brilliant Idiots and MTV2. They discuss how to beat ISIS, the best ways to tell if someone has an STD and the guys give you relationship advice. The podfather Chris Morrow makes an appearance, as does our friend the always outrageous Premium Pete.

episodes.title: The NORE Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: We have a special Thanksgiving treat for you. The Queens legend N.O.R.E. stops by and talks growing up in Lefrak, being an advocate for self defense in the hood, if Pun really hit Jay Z with a bottle and why hip hop needs more black executives. This episode was definitely for the culture.

episodes.title: The Kenneth Montgomery Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Tax welcomes attorney Kenneth Montgomery, the criminal attorney best known for working with rappers like Bobby Shmurda. Montgomery talks growing up during the crack era in Brooklyn, working in the BK District Attorney's office and some of high profile cases he has represented. A must listen episode for anyone who has been caught up in the system.

episodes.title: The Tristan Walker Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: The Bevel GAWD, Tristan Walker finally makes an appearance on his favorite podcast. Tax, Tristan and special co-host and comedian Danielle Mop talk being black in Silicon Valley, Nas investing in Walker & Co and why Queens dudes find love so young. The young OG Tristan is dropping so real jewels so sit back and press play.

episodes.title: The White Girl Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: The Jersey Shore's Sammi Sweetheart, Wendy William's show relationship expert (and shooter) Siggy Flicker and TV host Claire Galterio from the Just Sayin' podcast stop by to discuss mouth romance, if they would take back a man who cheats and if any of them had sex with Fetty Wap.

episodes.title: The Joe Budden Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Joe Budden stops by to talk podcasting, battle rap and his new album, then things go south. Enjoy Internets!

episodes.title: Slim Jesus & Bbillions
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In this episode we have @Bbillions coming through to talk about his SadderDay clothing line, his love of East African women and why his last long term relationship ended. We also got Slim Jesus stopping by to finally answer the question if he is really about that life. This is a wild episode so sit back and press play

episodes.title: Tax Season Live from Atlanta
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Last week Tax was in Atlanta for A3C week and was shown some real southern hospitality. DJ Drama was gracious enough to let us use his studio and we had a who's who of the Atlanta scene and some NY/NJ representatives in the studio. First up we have balleralert.com editor Steph @Eleven8 to talk about Atlanta and the interesting origin of her blog. Next up is Cheech from TheRapFest.com talking about the big things in store for his blog and his thoughts on the music scene. Louisiana rapper @younggreatness7 also stops by to talk about his next mixtape. And if that wasn't enough we have Atlantic Records A&R Orlando Wartonberg who discovered Fetty Wap drop some real jewels. Closing the show we have the young OG Jah aka @HipHopObama from Bossip.com giving you insight on the hottest rappers in the A and how to move in these streets. This is a jam packed episode so sit back and press play beloved.

episodes.title: The Source Ep Ft Londell McMillian
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In this episode of Tax Season we have Source owner, Londell McMillian. The duo discuss how Londell came to own The Source, adapting to the internet, his thoughts on Benzino and Dave Mays and what's next for the magazine.

episodes.title: The Bartender Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Tax has been slandering bartenders for years and in this episode we get to the bottom of his issues. @AnjenyLust, @SweetHearSela, and @Iam.miniluv join Tax in the studio to discuss why bartenders have beef with strippers, should a man let his lady bartend and much more. Also author and self proclaimed Lust Doctor @KasmoHuxtable and stylist @Simplicityxstyle stop by to give their perspective on the bartender quagmire.

episodes.title: The Smoke Dza Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In this episode Tax is joined by @DJBenHaMeen from @FanBrosShow stops by to talk about getting locked up in Dubai and what he has in store for Comic Con, as well as stylist and blogger @Simplicitycxsty. Then Smoke Dza drops in to discuss fashion week, who has the best Polo collection in NYC and if Dza can out smoke Uncle Snoop

episodes.title: The Maino and Stephanie Santiago
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Maino and the Loud Speaker Network's own Stephanie Santiago join Tax in the studio to discuss sex, holding your man down while he does a bid, why Maino is the King of Brooklyn and whether he's still a goon. 

Not discussed: why Stehpanie blocked Tax on IG.

episodes.title: The Wax and Kyra Chaos Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In this episode Tax is joined in the studio by UnCommon Sense regular @waxkyng and DJ @KyraChaos. The trio discuss the West India Parade, what's the best phone to look at porn and if Kyra Chaos has any beef with DJ's.

episodes.title: Premium Pete
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Tax is joined by fellow Loud Speaker Premium Pete of The Combat Jack show for a spirited discussion on life behind bars, including Pete's tips for how to fall asleep when you're in the hole and what happened when he literally dropped the soap during a stay in Rikers. 

But before that, Tax shares his views on the VMAs and why he's starting to fall for Trump.

episodes.title: The Styles P Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
In episode 24 Tax sits down with Styles P for some OG Talk. They discuss the current status of Hip Hop, what Meek Mill should have done differently and why OG's should respect the new generation of rappers. The Henny was flowing for this episode and jewelers dropped some real jewels. So sit back and press play.

Make sure you go and cop Styles P new project A Wise Guy and a Wise Guy available now.
https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/a-wise-guy-and-a-wise-guy/id1018938069

Check out GetBevel.com today and use promo code "TAX" to get 20% off you first purchase of Bevel, the only premiere shaving system for people with coarse, curly and thick hair.

episodes.title: The Desus and Mero Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Tax is back--and The Bronx is the building for the occasion!! His UnCommon Sense castmates Desus and Mero drop in for an epic convo on life in pre-gentrified New York, working for MTV, telling Ja Rule "....not really," not sleeping on Albanians, why you should always be afraid of older Spanish men who talk shit and so much more....

Go to GetBevel.com and enter code "Tax" for %20 off your first month

episodes.title: The Lost Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Tax is on a break this week celebrating his birthday somewhere exotic (Dubai? Ibiza?) but we couldn't leave you hanging. So master engineer Samir (@sjkaram) went to work and sprinkled some magic on an ep we'd thought we'd lost due to technical difficulties back in May. It features stripper and burgeoning mogul Cardi B. as well as visits from Combat Jack and Vida Bella. Enjoy beloveds and we will be back next week with a fresh episode!!!

episodes.title: The Memphis Bleek Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Tax sits down with Roc-a-Fella alumni Memphis Bleek. They go deep into Bleek's history and discuss Jay Z, the downfall of the Roc and classic Summer Jams. Bleed also shares his thoughts on the current state of NY hip hop, ghostwriting and Jay Z making people disappear. 

Also make sure you go to ZampleBox.com and use coupon code "TAXSEASON" to get 10% off when you join.

episodes.title: The Albee Al Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
In episode 18, Tax and guest co-host Diamond (@Mrs_OctoburrJB) welcome Jersey City rapper @AlbeeAl201 to the show. Fresh out of prison after beating a murder charge and doing a 5 year bid, Albee Al shares what led to his arrest, how he has grown from his ordeal and what's next for the Jersey spitter. 

Also make sure you stay tuned to find out who violated the Tax Code this week

episodes.title: The Wax Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Tax and guest co-host @MissTit_4_Tat welcome the one and only Wax from the Brilliant Idiots to the show. Wax talks about how he met Charlamange,  being on #UncommonSense and why he brings ice cubes to the bedroom. 
The trio also discuss El Chapo's escape, 50 Cent filing for bankruptcy, why Tati hates selfie sticks and what Wax's big plans for chickens.

Also make sure you stay tuned to find out who broke the Tax Code this week.

episodes.title: Tax Season Ep 16: Ask The Ladies
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Fellas, confused about what makes ladies tick? Then listen close as Tax welcomes his female friends @celebkitty & @NopsjustQs to answer all the questions men have about women, including whether women are truly down to eat ass and whether your girl is really gay or not.

episodes.title: Tax Season Ep 15
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: Tax is joined by co-host @ClareGalterio to discuss the BET awards, gay marriage and Tax's issue with Nipsey Hustle. Then @itsbizkit stops by to talk about the passing of his friend Chinx and and his t-shirt collaboration with Tax. Also in the house is @IAmControverse_ who explains that there is more to him than being an openly gay rapper.

episodes.title: The Therapy Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Episode 14 has been months in the making and it's finally here. In what's becoming a Loud Speaker's tradition, Tax sits down with phycologist Dr. Maya Pettiford for a no holds barred discussion. Dr. Pettiford gets Tax to open up about his childhood, family and fears. If you been riding with us since the start or you're a new fan this definitive episode to see what makes Tax tick.

Also make sure you use promo code "TAX" to get 20% off your first purchase of the Bevel shaving system. Go to GetBevel.com and cop your kit.

episodes.title: The Freeway Rick Ross Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: On episode 13, Tax interviews street legend Freeway Rick Ross. Ross talks about introducing crack to the west coast, getting setup by the LAPD and his involvement with the CIA selling drugs to fund secret wars in Central America. Also make sure you stay tuned to find out who violated the Tax Code this week.

episodes.title: Manolo Rose & Nyemiah Supreme
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In episode 12 Tax is joined in the studio by New York rappers @manolo_rose and @NyemiahSupreme. The trio discuss the current state of hip hop in New York, why rap veterans don't support new artist, Summer Jam and give their take on what's wrong with NYC's hip-hop station Hot 97.

episodes.title: The Slowbucks featuring BKTidalWave
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
In episode 11 we have the return of Brooklyn legend @BKTidalWave. She joins Tax in the co-host seat as the duo discuss Caitlyn Jenner, Summer Jam and what to do if you're stopped by the police with large sums of cash. Then Slowbucks stops by to talk about life after Summer Jam, his janky lawyer and what's next for his brand.

Also make sure you go to GetBevel.com and use promo code TAX to get 20% your purchase of Bevel

episodes.title: The @DDotOmen & @Tsu_Surf Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In episode 10, Tax and co-host @MissTit_4_Tat are joined in the studio by blogger @DDotOmen. The trio discuss DDot's recent work on ASAP Rocky's new album, his beef with other bloggers and if he secretly recorded the Watch The Throne listening sessions. Also battle rapper @Tsu_Surg stops by to talk about battle rapping, Instagram reality vs real life and his thoughts on Fetty Waps dreads.

episodes.title: Episode 9: Henny Talk
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In episode 9, Tax is joined by @LowKeyUHTN and Kam McCullough @KoolestKidOut of #HennyPalooza. The trio discuss the murder of Chinx, podcast wars, finding love at #HennyPalooza, Dominican vs Haitian women and if Jhene Aiko really has groceries.

episodes.title: Episode 8 Featuring BlogXilla
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary: In episode 8, Tax is joined by futurist @HighYellowHello, blogger @CleverlyChloe and renaissance man @BlogXilla. No man is safe or woman for that matter, as they discuss sending nudes, if edges matter, the best sizes of bosoms, real dates vs fake dates and thirsty men sliding into DMs.

episodes.title: Tax Season Episode 7
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Tax may have met his match as he welcomes @bktidalwave aka The ISIS Lady to the show. Along with returning guest co-host @MissTit_4_Tat, the trio discuss the Mayweather fight, Baltimore and having sex with rappers. Also @DJZeeti stops by to talk about his strong twitter game and if women on social media can be trusted.

Without a doubt this is one of the wildest episode of Tax Season yet. Press play and enjoy.

episodes.title: Tax Season Episode 6
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
On episode 6, Tax starts off by talking about the upcoming Mayweather/Pac fight with  @AndreasHale of Loud Speaker's The Corner podcast. Then Tax is joined by guest co-hosts @MILFY__ and @TaSha_Cee to talk Tidal, Bruce Jenner, the aftermath of Freddie Gray, why you shouldn't fly on Spirit Airlines and the power that West Indian women have over men in Brooklyn.

Also stay tuned to find out who violated the Tax Code this week.

episodes.title: The 40oz Van feat. @DevCNYC
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
TIn episode 5, Tax is joined by guest co-host @MissTit_4_Tat and
discuss the differences between classically trained dancers and
strippers, sex tapes and the right angles to pose when sending nudes.

Also 40oz_VAN and @DevCNYC stop by to drop gems on the best time to follow women on Twitter, why Big Sean and Ariana Grande split and hair bundles.

And in a new segment, find out who violated the Tax Code.

episodes.title: The Jack Thriller Episode feat
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Tax is joined by model turned artist @Blu_Gem_ as they discuss the pro and cons of a woman president, why pretty women should take selfie, the men who suck toes and the women who love them.

Also Jack Thriller stops by and discusses the popularity of
bartenders, why he has a star on his glass eye and paying women's utility bills.

Press play and maybe your cable bill will be paid this month.

episodes.title: The Combat Jack Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Tax welcomes guest co-host Raven B. Varona aka @RAVIEB. The duo discuss the health status of Plies, the perils of going to Fat Tuesday while wearing an 8 ball jacket and Tax's gay childhood friend. Also Combat Jack stops by and shares his opinion on race and giving back to the culture.

We raised the bar on this episode so sit back and press play.

episodes.title: The Pee Wee Kirkland Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
In a special edition of Tax Season, we bring you Pee Wee Kirkland, not only a basketball and Harlem street legend, but a father figure to Taxstone as well. Pee Wee shares his colorful history, discusses  the death of the "game" and challenges Tax to become the voice of a generation. 

As Pee Wee puts it "real recognizes real" so sit back and press play.

episodes.title: Tax Season Episode 1
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
It's episode 1 and Tax holds no punches as he and special guest Diamond D. (@Mrs_OctoburrrJB), a former Riker's Island Correctional Officer, discuss finding love in jail, the melee in McDonald's and the ramifications of showing your package to a female correctional officer. Plus some SXSW talk. 

So sit back and press play as East New York's own Taxstone takes you on a tour of his world.

episodes.title: Tax Season Sneak Preview: Episode 0
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Network
episodes.summary:
Come say hi to the bad guy!

It's Episode Zero of Tax Season, the new podcast from you're favorite "Twitter N**ga" @Taxstone.

As Taxstone tries his hand at this podcast thing, he's joined by @SashaDelvalle as they discuss stripping vs bartending, Dame Dash's financial advice and Kendrick's new album.

So sit back and buckle up,it's podcasting like you've never heard it before in Tax Season!!
